issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.notion.so/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.notion.so%2F) ### Comment Username: @woodpeckerbaby > You may have to log in and view any of your pages on Notion to see this. Alternatively, find a link to someone else's notion page. This issue may not show up on home page logged out. This page shows up even if I accept cookies, thus blocking me from using notion entirely.
